item.title: Hack@AC 2024
item.description:
Hack@AC 2024

I took part in Hack@AC 2024 with the team à¶žà¶žà¶žà¶ž. We attained 4th place in the tertiary category, having the same score as 3rd place, simply submitting the last flag later than them :(

Additionally, I won the first blood prize for solving the challenge web/Libwary.

ðŸ©¸ web/Fruit Color Query

One of the more interesting sql injection challenges.

Reconnaissance

Going to the website and using the sample apple picture provided, it seems that it outputs the colour of the fruit.
